t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, p) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    cakewalk = p // 2
    hard = p // 10
    cake1 = list(filter(lambda x: x >= cakewalk, arr))
    hard1 = list(filter(lambda x: 1 <= x <= hard, arr))
    if len(cake1) == 1 and len(hard1) == 2:
        print('yes')
    else:
        print('no')

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, p) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    r1 = int(p / 2)
    r2 = int(p / 10)
    l1 = list(filter(lambda x: x >= r1, l))
    l2 = list(filter(lambda x: x <= r2, l))
    if len(l1) == 1 and len(l2) == 2:
        print('yes')
    else:
        print('no')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (a, b) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    c = 0
    h = 0
    for i in a:
        c += 1 if i >= b // 2 else 0
        h += 1 if i <= b // 10 else 0
    print('yes' if c == 1 and h == 2 else 'no')
